s: [marines cross their long axes to bar Governor from LORD CUTLER BECKETT Governor Weatherby Swann, it's been too [the guard at the bottom of the steps holds a long gun with a bayonette [Will finds Gibbs' husk canteen hanging on a plant, trailing a long string] [the captain's body soon falls, revealing Mercer, who was standing behind the body, long knife in hand] PINTEL I think we've held fire long enough. [hands Elizabeth a long gun] Wishing the AC at work would stop pumping cold air in my face all day long. Reading: The Long Tail: Are dead-tree magazines good or bad for the climate? $DIA long scalp But the pharmaceutical company said it "anticipates the long-term savings resulting from the plan's implementation will more than offset short-term costs."
